item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a Software Engineer based in Christchurch, New Zealand. While I have a lot of experience with both backend and frontend engineering, my expertise these days is mostly focused around data engineering. I work with big data on a daily basis in my current role. Some things I know a bit about in no particular order: Linux Java Python Kotlin Scala Apache Druid Apache Kafka Hadoop Apache Spark Docker Amazon Web Services SQL Typescript Angular CSS Bash Avro Scrum Kanban Avro Feel free to get in touch with me at dave@cloventt.
